patterns: Where can I see my tasks?
responses: Go to 'My Tasks' section to view all your assigned tasks and their status.
You can check task status in the Tasks page. Each task shows step completion and deadline.
Navigate to Tasks menu to see all your tasks with progress indicators.
For Step 1: Click on 'Start Step 1' button on your task. Fill order ID, date, amount, and payment method. Submit to proceed.
To submit order: Go to your task, click Start Step 1, enter exact order details from your confirmation email.
Step 1 requires: Order ID, Order Date, Amount, Payment Method. Make sure details match your platform receipt.
For Step 2: After Step 1, click 'Continue Step 2'. Write detailed review (min 50 chars), select rating (1-5 stars), and submit.
Review requirements: Minimum 50 characters, honest experience, product quality feedback. Submit after receiving product.
Step 2: Write genuine review with rating. Include product quality, delivery experience. Don't include personal info.
Step 3 requires: Screenshot 1 (mandatory) of published review, Screenshot 2 (optional) of order details. Max 5MB each, JPG/PNG format.
Upload clear screenshots showing: 1) Your published review with rating, 2) Order details page. Ensure order ID is visible.
Screenshot guidelines: Clear, readable images. Screenshot 1 must show review on platform. Maximum file size: 5MB.
After completing all 3 steps, click 'Request Refund'. Provide bank details or UPI ID. Refunds processed within 3-5 business days.
Refund process: Complete Steps 1-3, then request refund with payment details. Admin processes within 3-5 days after verification.
Refund timeline: Submit payment details after Step 3. Once admin verifies, refund processed in 3-5 working days to your account.
Contact admin for deadline extension requests. Include your task ID and reason. Extensions granted case-by-case.
If you need more time, email admin with task details. Don't submit late work without approval.
Deadline extensions require admin approval. Message admin immediately if you can't complete on time.
Refunds take 3-5 business days after admin approval. Check task status: 'Refunded' means processed. Contact admin if delayed beyond 7 days.
Payment status: Check if task shows 'Refunded'. If processed but not received in 5 days, contact admin with transaction query.
Refund delays possible due to bank holidays. If status is 'Refunded' but no payment in 7 days, provide details to admin.
Clear browser cache, try different browser (Chrome recommended). If issue persists, contact admin with screenshot of error.
Technical issues: Check internet, disable ad-blockers. File uploads: Ensure <5MB, JPG/PNG format. Contact admin if continues.
Common fixes: Refresh page, logout/login. Upload issues: Check file size/format. Report persistent issues to admin with details.
Login issues: Use correct username/password. Forgot password? Contact admin to reset. Profile updates in Settings page.
Account help: Ensure correct credentials. Password reset requires admin. Profile updates allowed in Settings section.
Authentication: Check caps lock. If locked out, email admin. Profile changes available in your account settings.
Task value shown when assigned. Varies by product. Complete all steps to receive full amount. Check task details for exact value.
Each task has specific value shown in task card. Full payment after successful completion of all 4 steps.
Payment amount per task is specified in task assignment. View task details to see exact amount you'll receive.
New tasks assigned by admin based on availability. Complete existing tasks promptly to get more. Check Tasks page regularly.
Tasks assigned by admin. Finish current tasks efficiently to qualify for more. Contact admin if available for additional work.
Task assignment: Admin assigns based on performance. Complete tasks before deadline to receive more opportunities.
Contact admin via: 1) Email: admin@reviewflow.com 2) Phone: +91-XXXXXXXXXX 3) Direct message in system (if available).
Admin contact: Email issues with task ID. For urgent matters, use provided contact number during business hours.
Support: Email admin with detailed issue description and task ID. Response within 24 hours on working days.
You're welcome! Happy to help.
Glad I could assist! Let me know if you need anything else.
Anytime! Keep up the great work with your tasks.
ReviewFlow: You review products, get refunded. Steps: 1) Order product 2) Submit review 3) Upload screenshots 4) Get refund. Admin assigns tasks.
Process: Admin assigns product link → You purchase → Review → Submit proof → Get refunded. 4-step system ensures quality.
System workflow: Get task → Buy product → Review → Submit evidence → Receive payment. Each step verified by admin.
